verses.name: 1 Corinthians 2:1
verses.text: And I, brethren, when I came to you, came not with excellency of speech or of wisdom, declaring unto you the testimony of God.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 2:2
verses.text: For I determined not to know any thing among you, save Jesus Christ, and him crucified.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 2:3
verses.text: And I was with you in weakness, and in fear, and in much trembling.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 2:4
verses.text: And my speech and my preaching was not with enticing words of man’s wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 2:5
verses.text: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.
